description: Slender, fit Thyle Knoxx is on his way over to his father’s place, and he’s looking forward to meeting the new pool boy that his dad hired. He immediately starts crushing on buff, tattooed William Seed upon seeing the bare-chested stud standing by the pool. Horny Thyle heads indoors to change into his swim trunks hoping dreamy William will want to take them right off, and slide his thick, uncut cock between his cheeks.
title: Pool Daze
